PlatformContent.Title: Honeywell Technology Solutions for the CH‑47 Chinook
PlatformContent.Body: Honeywell offer a variety of technologies for the CH‑47 Chinook that help to improve safety, reliability and efficiency. Below is a list of some of the content we offer for the CH‑47 Chinook. • T55 Engine • APN‑209 Radar Altimeter/Antenna • H‑764 Embedded GPS/INS • Pitch/Trim Actuator • Lighting To find out more speak to one of our members of staff or search ‘Honeywell Aerospace’ online.

PlatformContent.Title: Honeywell Technology Solutions for the C‑130
PlatformContent.Body: Honeywell offer a variety of technologies for the C‑130 that help to improve safety, reliability and efficiency. Below is a list of some of the content we offer for the C‑130. • eNfusion® HMIA & Viper • Flight Management System (FMS) • Digital Autopilot/Flight Director • Control Display Unit • H764G Embedded GPS/INS • HG‑9550 Radar Altimeter • MILACAS‑XR • Enhanced Ground Proximity Warning System (EGPWS) • Lighting (Exterior and Interior) • Environmental Control System • Auxiliary Power Unit • Nacelle Interface Unit • Cabin Pressure System To find out more speak to one of our members of staff or search ‘Honeywell Aerospace’ online.

PlatformContent.Title: Honeywell Technology Solutions for the Abrams Tank
PlatformContent.Body: Honeywell offer a variety of technologies for the Abrams tank that help to improve safety, reliability and efficiency. Below is a list of some of the content we offer for the Abrams tank. • TALIN™ • AGT 1500 Main Engine • DECU Engine Controls • TALIN Navigation • NBC System • Generator • Generator Control Unit To find out more speak to one of our members of staff or search ‘Honeywell Aerospace’ online.

PlatformContent.Title: Honeywell Technology Solutions for the C‑17 Globemaster.
PlatformContent.Body: Honeywell offer a variety of technologies for the C‑17 Globemaster that help to improve safety, reliability and efficiency. Below is a list of some of the content we offer for the C‑17 Globemaster. • JetWave • Auxiliary Power Unit • Electronic Controls • Engine Start • Fuel Control • Landing Systems • Environmental Control Systems • H‑423 Inertial Navigation System • Air Data Computer • H‑764G Embedded GPS/INS • Multifunction Display System • Flight Management System Software To find out more speak to one of our members of staff or search ‘Honeywell Aerospace’ online.
